description: Display of 1 x externally mounted, illuminated, fascia sign and 1 x externally mounted, non-illuminated hanging/projecting sign
decision_conditions: The suspended digital advertising screen and illuminated fascia signage would have a detrimental impact on the special character and amenity of a Conservation Area. As such the proposal would be contrary to CS8 and DM12 of the RBK Core Strategy 2012.
The applicant can contact the Highway Authority on 020 8547 5002.

Please provide existing and proposed floor plans/ elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works.If no changes are proposed to elevations please provide photographs with confirmation that no changes are being made.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor works not causing loss of public amenity. The Council response should therefore be one of no objection.Recommendation:No objections.
